channel.title: Documentation on Verso IT Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Verso IT Solutions

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Welcome to the Mainroad theme documentation. This quick guide has been written for intermediate and advanced users who are interested in getting started with the Mainroad theme, including installation and minimal configuration. To fully understand the rest of this guide, you need to be familiar with the main concepts of the Hugo static site generator.

item.title: Customization
item.description: Customization page describes common Mainroad configuration parameters which can be specified via configuration file or via Front Matter section. That includes logo section tuning, adding a sidebar with widgets, adjusting highlight color, and more.

item.title: Frequently asked questions (FAQ)
item.description: Browse this FAQ page to find a collection of answers to frequently asked questions that have not been covered elsewhere in the documentation.
